attributes.action: change the laws that govern the payment of Carers Allowance so that it is brought in line with the Minimum Wage rules as set out by the DTI. This would mean that the 35 hours minimum requirement to claim CA would require a payment of at least 35 hours at the rate for minimum wage that is from time to time applicable.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Carers are typically called upon to work in excess of 35 hours per week looking after their; Children, Spouses, Parents, Elderly Relatives, Friends; all for less than £50 per week, an illegal wage for the number of hours worked.  They do this because they really care about their Carees.  If the NHS and Social Services were called upon to take over these duties it is estimated it would cost in excess of £56bn per year. The least we can do is pay the minimum wage for the work they do.
